summary: This bill, the Establishing Accreditation Grants for Law Enforcement Act of 2025 (EAGLE Act of 2025), directs the Attorney General to create a grant program for local law enforcement agencies seeking accreditation or re-certification.  The program aims to address financial needs related to accreditation, including fees and assessment charges. Funds, totaling $10 million for fiscal year 2025, can only be used for accreditation purposes. The bill defines qualified accreditation and local law enforcement agencies.
